issue.title: [CF 769] Entering combat while moving a group doesn't release the mouse
issue.body:
I have TMW set to not allow config in combat.  When I enter combat, it turns off config mode.  All well and good for fiddling with my UI while riding around on the isle of thunder, except when I'm in the middle of mouse-dragging a group when I enter combat.  Then I can't mouselook while in combat, and probably other mouse stuff not working either.  Leaving combat and doing /tmw, the group was still dragging with the mouse, but clicking mouse buttons didn't let go of it.

Fixed with /reload; icon group was back to where it was, was able to move it just fine while not running near hostile mobs.  Just glad that combat was one I wanted to run away from anyway :P

This was with v6.1.6 r721.  If this isn't easily reproducible, I can post more details, like my full config settings and my icons or w/e you need.


> Posted by CurseForge user Karsteck | Imported from CurseForge issue #769 | Raw

comments.body:
Thanks for bringing this to my attention. I have heard of this bug once before, but the exact form of that report was something like "WTF MAN THIS THING GETZ STUK TO CURSER AND BREAKS UI HAVE TO ALTF4 AND REINSTALL". Thanks for being much more objective!

Behavior should be greatly improved in r722
